info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 16 at 2:27AM MDT until March 17 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 7 inches except between 8 and 12 inches above 7500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Traffic speeds will be reduced. Allow extra time to reach your destination. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow may reduce visibility. Travel impacts are likely on area roadways. This includes Interstate 25 from near Raton to the Colorado state line.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
